group_1.textLeft: We’ve saved up quite a bit of fuel, haven’t we?

group_1.textRight: ‘Cuz we went outta our way to make a detour @before continuin’ on!
Aight, onto the next town...

group_1.textLeft: ...Let’s go!

group_1.textRight: ...Huh?
Heey, Tsuruno! Look at that!

group_1.textLeft: At what?

group_1.textRight: At the sky! The sky!
The Wishin’ Star... @Ain’t it kinda awfully close?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:120301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?@[wait:1.0][chara:120301:lipSynch_1]It really is!
We’re getting closer!@[chara:120301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:120301:cheek_1][chara:120301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:120301:lipSynch_1]To the End of the World...!

group_1.textRight: Just watching these Santas on a journey to the @End of the World...
somehow puts me on the edge of my seat!

group_1.textLeft: I feel a little embarrassed when I think of how @that’s my other self.

group_1.textRight: Hold up, why am I even paired with Tsuruno!

group_1.textLeft: If I remember right, didn’t we start the game @together in the same town?

group_1.textRight: You’re probably right...
Um, was it that village with only three people?
The one those girls mentioned.
Someplace like... a school, for souls?

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, that!
That’s actually a tutorial to get used to the game.
It’s the first village you pass through.

group_1.textRight: Before the main game begins and ya enter any @towns!
Eh...? Was that what it was?
Was that all?

group_1.textLeft: That was all!@[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]Are you disappointed?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, a little...

group_1.textLeft: How it works is newbies and senpais are put in @groups of three
and when a new player joins, the oldest one leaves.

group_1.textRight: ...Wouldn’t it be really chaotic if a ton of people @came in all at once?

group_1.textLeft: It looks like it would be okay though? Through the power of...  parallel processing or something like that.

group_1.textRight: When the tutorial ends, ya get launched into other towns.
Me and Tsuruno were in the same town as Kako.

group_1.textLeft: Kako-chan introduced us to this game after all!
Though, even if you start out in random towns,
your other selves will usually get along if you’re @close in real life.

group_1.textRight: Because of... compatible personalities?

group_1.textLeft: Right!

group_1.textRight: ...Oh, there was one other thing I thought was @strange.
Earlier, when you decided on the destination for @your game versions,
didn't they say,
“I can hear the voice of an angel”?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe they’re calling our real-life selves “angels”.
The Three Magi are probably
Touka-chan, Nemu-chan, and Ui-chan?

group_1.textRight: But all I did was say that I liked Christmas...

group_1.textLeft: Yo, yo.
What’s up with the drop in number of people who @can hear angels’ voices?

group_1.textRight: Um... Because there’s nobody playing anymore...?

group_1.textLeft: I see, well I got bored and quit too!
When you delete your game account,
it seems that your character also disappears from @their town.

group_1.textRight: Although it looks like there are new characters too.

group_1.textLeft: I’m sure there are a few players who are being introduced to the game for the first time!
